billEvents.eventText: referred to consumer affairs and protection

title: Provides for the proper packaging and labeling of pharmaceutical drugs; creates penalties for intentional fraud
summary: Provides for the proper packaging and labeling of pharmaceutical drugs; creates penalties for intentional fraudulent replacement, packaging, and labeling of such drugs; provides for better consumer protection.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to preserving the integrity and safety of pharmaceutical drugs
